sources.title: In the Money (1933) Lois Wilson, Warren Hymer | Comedy, Drama | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Professor Higgingbottom, an ardent member of the Whales, is offered a chance to invest $5,000 in a gold mine.

Director: Frank R. Strayer
Writers: Robert Ellis,
Stars: Richard 'Skeets' Gallagher, Lois Wilson, Warren Hymer 
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Drama

metadata.Plot: Professor Higgingbottom, an ardent member of the Whales, is offered a chance to invest $5,000 in a gold mine. Mrs. Higginbottom is opposed but the four Higginbottom children approve, on the premise that if Pa makes some easy money, they can continue to loaf. Grandpa, a kindly but meddling old soul also arrives for a visit. Money begins to roll in but not as fast as the children spend it. And then the investment turns out to be a pyramid scheme, and the family is stone-cold broke.
metadata.Actors: Richard 'Skeets' Gallagher, Lois Wilson, Warren Hymer
